description: Number of dissections of a polygon into n pentagons.
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
F. Harary, E. M. Palmer and R. C. Read, On the cell-growth problem for arbitrary polygons, Discr. Math. 11 (1975), 371-389.
crossrefs: Cf. A002293, A005037 (no mirror-image symmetries), A003446 (triangles), A005035 (quadrilaterals).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Mar 12 2016
